member.name: T:Cake.GitLabCI.Module.GitLabCIEngine
member.remarks: This engine emits additional console output to make GitLab CI render the output of the indiviudal Cake tasks as collapsible sections (see Custom collapsible sections (GitLab Docs)).

member.name: M:Cake.GitLabCI.Module.GitLabCIEngine.#ctor(Cake.Core.ICakeDataService,Cake.Core.Diagnostics.ICakeLog,Cake.Core.IConsole)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cake.GitLabCI.Module.GitLabCIEngine.GetSectionNameForTask(System.String)
member.summary: Computes a unique GitLab CI section name for a task name.
member.remarks: GitLab CI requires a section name in both the "start" and "end" markers of a section. The name can only be composed of letters, numbers, and the _, ., or - characters. In Cake, each task corresponds to one section. Since the task name may contain characters not allowed in the section name, unsupprted characters are removed from the task name. Additionally, this method ensures that the section name is unique and the same task name will be mapped to the same section name for each call.

member.name: M:Cake.GitLabCI.Module.GitLabCILog.#ctor(Cake.Core.IConsole,Cake.Core.Diagnostics.Verbosity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Cake.AzurePipelines.Module.GitLabCIModule
member.remarks:
When was introduced initially, it was placed in the Cake.AzurePipelines.Module namespace by accident.
The namespace has since been adjusted, but this class is still provided in the Cake.AzurePipelines.Module namespace for backwards compatibility in Cake.Frosting projects. When possible, use instead.
